sections.PURPOSE: Evaluate the Europe Best Squad competitors on their ability to load, fire, correct, malfunction, unload, clear the weapon system, group, zero, and conduct situation based marksmanship with the weapon system.
sections.MISSION: Europe Best squad competitors conduct M240B range IOT evaluate squads on M240B machine gun proficiency NLT 28JUL23.
sections.END STATE:
All Squad execute range, scores recorded and range is cleaned. Concept of the Operation: This OPN will be conducted in III Phases:
Phase I (Planning & Prep): Begins with identifying personnel to be trained and provide range support and ends when Range Support personnel SP to Range 112 NLT 28 0800 JUL23.
sections.KEY TASKS:
100% accountability of MWE, police call range, range cleared, ammo pickup
Timeline: 0630- Ammo Pick-up
0745-Conitions set
0800- Range Hot
1700- Range Cold
1800- Range clean-up complete
Service & Support: -Correct Malfunction- 25 blank rds/firer -Group/Zero- 50 rds/firer
-Qualification- 200 rds/firer
Medical Support: Medics in MEV
sections.EXECUTION: -Evaluation): Begins when group and zero is complete and ends when evaluation is complete NLT 28 1800 JUL 23. Squads will execute Table VI Day Transition M240B qualification
sections.COMMAND AND SIGNAL:
PACE Plan
P: Radio
A: Cell
Uniform: UCP, ACH, IOT, plates, eye protection, ear, protection, glove. Dragoon Standard.
Troops to Task: 1x OIC, 1x RSO, 2x Gate Guard, 3x Safeties, 2x Medic/CLS, 1x MEV Driver, 1x Ammo NCO, 2x Ammo Detail, 10x graders
